installer.script: docker run --rm -v ${dir}:/app/out -w /app -e version=$version golang:1.22-alpine sh -c 'apk --no-cache add --update make libx11-dev git gcc libc-dev && git clone https://github.com/derailed/k9s.git && cd k9s && git checkout $version && GOOS=windows GOARCH=amd64 make build && mv execs/k9s /app/out/k9s.exe'
